insert into appointment(appointmentId, departmentTimeId, userId,purposeOfVisit,meetingFinished,dateCreated,appointmentDate) values (#{appointmentId},#{departmentTimeId},#{userId},#{purposeOfVisit},#{meetingFinished},NOW(),#{appointmentDate})
select last_insert_id()
mapper.update: update appointment set endTime = CURTIME(), meetingNotes=#{meetingNotes}, meetingFinished ='Y' where appointmentId=#{appointmentId}
update appointment set startTime = CURTIME(), officialId = #{official_id}, meetingFinished = 'N' where appointmentId = #{app_id}
mapper.select: select gu.* from generaluser gu, appointment a where a.appointmentId = #{app_id} and a.userId = gu.userId

select appointment.userId,appointment.purposeOfVisit,appointment.dateCreated, appointment.appointmentId ,generaluser.firstName, generaluser.lastName from appointment inner join generaluser on appointment.userId=generaluser.userId inner join departmenttimeslot on departmenttimeslot.departmentTimeId=appointment.departmentTimeId where departmenttimeslot.departmentId=#{departmentId} and appointment.appointmentDate=curdate() and appointment.meetingFinished='N' order by time(appointment.dateCreated) asc;

SELECT a.*,d.departmentName FROM appointment a, departmenttimeslot ds, department d WHERE a.departmentTimeId = ds.departmentTimeId AND ds.departmentId = d.departmentId and a.userId= #{userId} ORDER BY a.appointmentDate DESC

select * from appointment where departmentTimeId in ( select departmentTimeId from departmenttimeslot where departmentId=#{department_id}) and meetingFinished='N' and appointmentDate=CURDATE() order by appointmentId ASC Limit 0,1

select g.* from appointment a, generaluser g where a.departmentTimeId IN (select departmentTimeId from departmenttimeslot where departmentId = #{department_id}) and a.meetingFinished='N' and a.startTime='00:00:00' and g.userId=a.userId ORDER BY a.appointmentId ASC Limit 0,1
mapper.update: update appointment set meetingFinished = 'C' where appointmentId = #{appointmentId}
update appointment set meetingFinished = 'L' where appointmentId = #{appointmentId}
mapper.select: select count(*) from appointment where departmentTimeId IN (select departmentTimeId from departmenttimeslot where departmentId = #{department_id})
select count(*) from appointment where userId = ${userId}
select * from appointment WHERE appointmentDate = #{appointmentDate} AND meetingFinished = 'Y' AND #{appointmentId} > appointmentId AND departmentTimeId = #{departmentTimeId} ORDER BY appointmentId
select * from appointment WHERE appointmentDate = #{appointmentDate} AND #{appointmentId} > appointmentId AND departmentTimeId = #{departmentTimeId} AND meetingFinished = 'N' ORDER BY appointmentId
